dejv.commons.jfx.binding

Class ReductionDoubleBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.beans.binding.NumberExpressionBase
      • javafx.beans.binding.DoubleExpression
        • javafx.beans.binding.DoubleBinding
          • dejv.commons.jfx.binding.ReductionDoubleBinding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.beans.binding.Binding<Number>, javafx.beans.binding.NumberBinding, javafx.beans.binding.NumberExpression, javafx.beans.Observable, javafx.beans.value.ObservableDoubleValue, javafx.beans.value.ObservableNumberValue, javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<Number>

    public class ReductionDoubleBinding
extends javafx.beans.binding.DoubleBinding
    A variant of DoubleBinding, that applies provided reduction operation (represented by BinaryOperator) on its dependencies.

    If there are no dependencies, binding value is equal to 0.0d (this default value can be modified using the setIdentity(double) method).

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    dejv78 (dejv78.github.io)

      • ReductionDoubleBinding

        public ReductionDoubleBinding(BinaryOperator<Double> binaryOperator,
                              javafx.beans.value.ObservableDoubleValue... dependencies)
        Creates a new instance of ReductionDoubleBonding with a given BinaryOperator and an optional set of initial dependencies.
        Parameters:
        binaryOperator - The associative accumulation function (see BinaryOperator for more details)
        dependencies - An optional set of dependencies to be initially bound

    • Method Detail

      • setIdentity

        public ReductionDoubleBinding setIdentity(double identity)
        Modify the identity value of the current binding.

        Note: Please keep in mind, that "identity" value always affects the result. For example, if the dependencies are "a" and "b", given BinaryOperator is sum(a, b), and the identity is set to "c", then the result will be "a+b+c"! (Standard behavior of Stream.reduce(BinaryOperator)).

        Parameters:
        identity - New identity value
        Returns:
        The current binding with updated identity value

      • add

        public final void add(javafx.beans.value.ObservableDoubleValue dependency)

        Parameters:
